pullRequest.title: easier course creation on dev environment
pullRequest.bodyText:
Allow admins again to customize group names when creating and editing courses:

Admins can customize groups in create course and update course dialog: customization is activated automatically in dev mode (e.g. locally) and inactive in prod mode (e.g. on test server), but can be switched. When default groups are used, they will be created in JIRA. When custom groups are used, they have to exist in JIRA
Only admins can change groups in update course, then Artemis checks that the changed group exists in JIRA
Instructors should NOT be able to edit groups



Checklist

 I tested all changes and all related features with different users (student, tutor, instructor, admin) on the test server https://artemistest.ase.in.tum.de.

Steps for Testing
Please test locally and on the test-server. As Admin and as instructor

Log in to Artemis
Navigate to Course Administration
Create and edit a course and try out different combinations of using default and customized groups

commit.message:
easier course creation on dev environment

admins can customize groups in create course and update course dialog
only admins can change groups in update course
uncomment code for local group checking
only load active courses in course management

nodes.bodyText: Comment does not belong to code.

Maximum Complaint Deadline

Doesn't deadline imply maximum already?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -24,20 +24,24 @@
             "courseIcon": "Course Icon",
             "shortName": "Short Name",
             "maxComplaints": {
-                "title": "Maximum Amount of Complaints",
+                "title": "Maximum amount of Complaints",
                 "description": "Set the maximum amount of complaints allowed"
             },
             "maxComplaintTimeDays": {
                 "title": "Deadline for complaints in days after result date",
-                "description": "Maximum Complaint Deadline for student complaints. This refers to days after the result is available (assessment due date or after the result date depending on which one is later). Students will not be able to complain anymore after the deadline."
+                "description": "Maximum Complaint Deadline for student complaints. This refers to days after the result is available (assessment due date or after the result date depending on which one is later). Students will not be able to complain anymore after this deadline."
